dtl


Web Sites Related to DTL or STL

  • The SGI STL Site. A free implementation of the STL at SGI + good docs and links.
  • The Matrix Template Library at Notre Dame. A high-performance generic linear algebra library.
  • Port of the SGI STL to other compilers, by Boris Fomitchev.
  • The STL Newbie Guide by Mumit Khan
  • Alexander Stepanov's Edizioni Infomedia interview.
  • Dr. Dobb's Journal interview with Alexander Stepanov
  • Oracle and ODBC Template Library. Our Competition!

Books about the STL and generic programming

Generic Programming and the STL, by Matthew Austern. Addison-Wesley, 1998. ISBN 0-201-30956-4.

Designing Components with the C++ STL, by Ulrich Breymann. Addison Wesley Longman, 1998. ISBN 0-201-17816-8.

 

Developer / C++ Websites

thefreecountry.com Lots of free stuff: Developer City (free programmers' resources), eCentriCity (free web designers' resources), Software City (free software).

freshmeat.net Excellent resource for open source software libraries and helpful open source development tools. A must see!

WWW C++ sites by Rob Davies - very comprehensive resource for C++ sites on the web.

Open Directory Project. One of the best internet cataloging ideas to come out in a long time. Here is their blurb: "As the web grows, automated search engines and directories with small editorial staffs will be unable to cope with the volume of sites. The Open Directory Project's goal is to produce the most comprehensive directory of the web, by relying on a vast army of volunteer editors."
